'''1.20.3 Pre-Release 2''' (known as '''1.20.3-pre2''' in the launcher) is the second pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.20.3]], released on November 22, 2023,<ref>{{mcnet|minecraft-1-20-3-pre-release-2|Minecraft 1.20.3 Pre-Release 2}}</ref> which fixes bugs and adds new breakable blocks to the [[wind charge]].

== Experimental ==
These changes only take effect when the [[Update 1.21]] experimental data pack is enabled.

=== Changes ===
==== Non-mob entities ====
'''[[Wind charge]]'''
* Now break decorated pots, chorus flowers and pointed dripstone blocks upon collision.

==== General ====
'''[[Tag]]s'''
* Added {{cd|wind_charge}} into the {{cd|#impact_projectiles}} entity type tag.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.20.3 Pre-release 2
|;From 1.20.2
|265291|Command suggestions within the command block interface don't disappear when the console command field is unselected.
|265426|Certain inputs pressed whilst in {{key|F3+Esc}} pause will be carried out after game is unpaused.
|266380|Rain texture doesn't loop correctly.
|;dev
|265772|A command with multiple redirect modifiers can ignore "{{cd|maxCommandChainLength}}".
|265776|Interacting with decorated pots in spawn protection can create ghost items.
|266075|"Player teleports" not shown in subtitles when an ender pearl lands far from the thrower.
|266206|Renamed arrows are reffered as just "Arrow" in the death message.
|266439|Decorated pots with loot table desync item consumption if it cannot be inserted in the pot.
|266496|Wind charge can not break decorated pots.
|266516|Arrows on fire set breezes on fire, despite being deflected.
|266728|The "{{cd|styled}}" number format uses the resource location "{{cd|result}}".
|;previous
|266886|Backspace in anvil no longer works when renaming an item.
|266890|The {{cd|minecraft:grass}} item does not get upgraded to {{cd|minecraft:short_grass}}.
}}</onlyinclude>
